title: Virustotal Livehunt Rules
description: This connector allows organizations to create and manage VirusTotal Livehunts from OpenCTI. When enabling a Yara rule in OpenCTI automatically it does create a new Livehunt in VirusTotal.
short_description: This connector allows organizations to create and manage VirusTotal Livehunts from OpenCTI. When enabling a Yara rule in OpenCTI automatically it does create a new Livehunt in VirusTotal.
